title: RA Sushi's mango ceviche contains four types of seafood
statement: The mango ceviche at RA Sushi contains lobster, octopus, whitefish and shrimp mixed with mango, avocado, jalapeño, cilantro, shallots and citrus vinaigrette.

citations.quote: Lobster, octopus, whitefish and shrimp mixed with mango, avocado, jalapeño, cilantro, shallots and citrus vinaigrette; served with chips
